dc.title: U.S. Office of Special Counsel
dc.description: U.S. Office of Special Counsel (OSC) official agency web site. OSC protects federal employees and applicants from prohibited personnel practices, especially reprisal for whistleblowing. OSC also enforces the Hatch Act and protects the rights of federal employee military veterans and reservists under the Uniformed Services Employment and Reemployment Rights Act.
